headline: Can Western Digital Sustain Margin Gains Amid Rising Competition?
summary: WDC rebounds with surging margins, rising HDD demand and guidance for double-digit revenue growth ahead.

raw.headline: Can Western Digital Sustain Margin Gains Amid Rising Competition?

headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Western Digital (WDC) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Western Digital (WDC) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

raw.headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Western Digital (WDC) Is a Good Investment: Is It?

headline: Western Digital Corporation (WDC) Soars to 52-Week High, Time to Cash Out?
summary: Western Digital (WDC) is at a 52-week high, but can investors hope for more gains in the future? We take a look at the company's fundamentals for clues.

raw.headline: Western Digital Corporation (WDC) Soars to 52-Week High, Time to Cash Out?

headline: Should Western Digital's (WDC) Completed Buyback Program Prompt Portfolio Adjustments by Investors?
summary: Between May 9 and June 27, 2025, Western Digital repurchased 2,800,000 shares for US$151.12 million, completing its previously announced buyback program. This move underscores the company's commitment to shareholder returns amid broader market optimism, following recent Federal Reserve signals of possible interest rate cuts. We'll examine how Western Digital's completed share buyback could influence its future investment narrative and shareholder value proposition. Rare earth metals are an...
